text: is a Japanese cross-country skier. She competed in five events at the 1992 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese female cross-country skiers Category:Olympic cross-country skiers of Japan Category:Cross-country skiers at the 1992 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Niigata Prefecture Category:Asian Games medalists in cross-country skiing Category:Cross-country skiers at the 1990 Asian Winter Games Category:Asian Games gold medalists for Japan Category:Medalists at the 1990 Asian Winter Games
title: Miwa Ota
